image.alt: Luxury Powermatic 80 Black Men's Watch

imageHover.alt: Luxury Powermatic 80 Black Men's Watch

nameValue: Luxury Powermatic 80 Black Men's Watch
name: Luxury Powermatic 80 Black Men's Watch
description: Silver-tone stainless steel case and bracelet. Fixed silver-tone stainless steel bezel. Black dial with silver-tone hands and index hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Tissot Calibre Powermatic 80 (C07.111) Automatic movement, based upon ETA 2824-2, containing 23 Jewels, bitting at 21600 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 80 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Skeleton case back. Round case shape, case size: 41 mm, case thickness: 9.75 mm. Band width: 18. Deployment with push button release clasp. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: date, hour, minute, second. Additional Info: in general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling.

image.alt: Endurer Chronograph Automatic Black Dial Men's Watch

imageHover.alt: Endurer Chronograph Automatic Black Dial Men's Watch

nameValue: Endurer Chronograph Automatic Black Dial Men's Watch
name: Endurer Chronograph Automatic Black Dial Men's Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a black (alligator) leather strap. Fixed stainless steel bezel. Black dial with luminous silver-tone hands and index hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display below the 12 o'clock position. Combination sub-dial showing: 60 seconds and 12 hours. Bvlgari Daniel Roth calibre DR 1306 automatic movement with a 45-hour power reserve. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Transparent case back. Unique case shape. Case dimensions: 56 mm x 51 mm. Case thickness: 14.5 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 100 meters / 330 feet. Functions: chronograph, date, hour, minute, second.

image.alt: Ballon Bleu Silver Diamond Dial 18kt Pink Gold Ladies Watch

imageHover.alt: Ballon Bleu Silver Diamond Dial 18kt Pink Gold Ladies Watch

nameValue: Ballon Bleu Silver Diamond Dial 18kt Pink Gold Ladies Watch
name: Ballon Bleu Silver Diamond Dial 18kt Pink Gold Ladies Watch
description: 18kt pink gold case with a purple (alligator) leather strap. Fixed 18kt pink gold bezel. Silver lacquered dial with blued-steel sword-shaped hands and diamond hour markers. Roman numeral appears at the 12 o'clock positions. minute markers around an inner ring. Dial Type: Analog. Cartier calibre ETA 2892-A2 automatic movement with a 42-hour power reserve. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Solid case back. Round case shape. Case size: 36 mm. Case thickness: 12.05 mm. Band width: 20 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Functions: hour, minute.

image.alt: Quartz Mother of Pearl Dial Ladies Watch

imageHover.alt: Quartz Mother of Pearl Dial Ladies Watch

nameValue: Quartz Mother of Pearl Dial Ladies Watch
name: Quartz Mother of Pearl Dial Ladies Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a two-tone (silver-tone and rose gold-tone) stainless steel bracelet. Fixed stainless steel bezel set with crystals. Mother of pearl dial with rose gold-tone hands and index hour markers. Dial Type: Analog. Citizen caliber 9627 quartz movement. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Pull / push crown. Solid case back. Round case shape. Case size: 24 mm. Case thickness: 6.5 mm. Band width: 12 mm. Fold over clasp with a push button release. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Functions: hour, minute.

image.alt: Calatrava Pilot Travel Time 18kt White Gold Automatic Men's Watch

imageHover.alt: Calatrava Pilot Travel Time 18kt White Gold Automatic Men's Watch

nameValue: Calatrava Pilot Travel Time 18kt White Gold Automatic Men's Watch
name: Calatrava Pilot Travel Time 18kt White Gold Automatic Men's Watch
description: 18kt white gold case with a brown calfskin leather strap. Fixed white 18kt white gold bezel. Blue varnished dial with luminous sword-shaped hands and Arabic numeral hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display at the 6 o'clock position. Date sub-dial. Patek Philippe calibre 324 S C FUS automatic movement, containing 29 Jewels, composed of 294 parts, bitting at 28800 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 45 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Screw locked crown. Transparent case back. Round case shape. Case size: 42 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 60 meters / 200 feet. Functions: date, second time zone, hour, minute, second, day/night indicator.

image.alt: Open Box - Tommy Hilfiger Sport Champagne Dial Men's Watch

imageHover.alt: Open Box - Tommy Hilfiger Sport Champagne Dial Men's Watch

nameValue: Open Box - Tommy Hilfiger Sport Champagne Dial Men's Watch
name: Open Box - Tommy Hilfiger Sport Champagne Dial Men's Watch
description: Gold-tone stainless steel case with a beige leather strap. Fixed gold-tone bezel with a white enamel inlay. Champagne dial with luminous gold-tone hands and index hour markers. Minute markers. Arabic numeral minute markers (at 5 minute intervals) around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Three multi-function sub-dials displaying: 24 hours, date and day of the week. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Pull / push crown. Solid case back. Round case shape. Case size: 40 mm. Case thickness: 10 mm. Band width: 16 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Sport Series.

image.alt: Blue Altiplano Ultra-This Hand Wind Men's Watch

imageHover.alt: Blue Altiplano Ultra-This Hand Wind Men's Watch

nameValue: Blue Altiplano Ultra-This Hand Wind Men's Watch
name: Blue Altiplano Ultra-This Hand Wind Men's Watch
description: 18kt rose gold case with a blue (alligator) leather strap. Fixed 18kt rose gold bezel. Blue dial with rose gold hands. No markers. Dial Type: Analog. Piaget calibre 430P Hand Wind movement, containing 18 Jewels, composed of 131 parts, bitting at 21600 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 43 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Screw down crown. Solid case back. Round case shape. Case size: 38 mm. Case thickness: 6.6 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Functions: hour, minute.
